thread.title: 'Bethany' Trailer: Shannen Doherty and Tom Green Bring Horror Home (Exclusive) | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: 'Bethany' Trailer: Shannen Doherty and Tom Green Bring Horror Home (Exclusive) | Hollywood Reporter

title: 'Bethany' Trailer: Shannen Doherty and Tom Green Bring Horror Home (Exclusive) | Hollywood Reporter
text:
5:00am PT by Aaron Couch 'Bethany' Trailer: Shannen Doherty and Tom Green Bring Horror Home (Exclusive) James Cullen Bressack directed the project about a young woman haunted by her childhood imaginary friend. 
Tom Green and Shannen Doherty are proving why sometimes home is not where the heart is in the first trailer for Bethany . 
The horror project is from director James Cullen Bressack and centers on a young woman named Claire (Stefanie Estes) who moves back to her childhood home only to be haunted by her imaginary friend from when she was a child. 
Zack Ward, who co-wrote the film with Bressack, stars as Claire's husband, with Green playing her psychiatrist and Doherty playing her late mother. 
Kenneth Gust, Ace Underhill, Doherty, Shant Jordan and Shahen Jordan produced alongside Bressack and Ward. 
"I've obviously done a lot of outrageous characters and ridiculous things in my TV show, and this is a more serious role," he said. 
Uncork'd is releasing the project on VOD and in theaters on April 7. Aaron Couch
